body.name: Gel Seat Cushion for Long Sitting, Double Thick Office Desk Home Wheelchair Seat Cushions for Back Hip Sciatica Tailbone Pain Sore Pressure Relief, Egg Gel Cooling Game Chair Pad for Car Truck Driver
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 1 min
features: 【Larger & Thicker】This Dark purple gel seat cushions for long sitting is specially designed large and thick, which perfectly provides soft supporting and flexibility. The gel seat pad measures 16.5 x 14.5 x 1.6 inches and weighs 2.4 pounds.

【Soft & Breathable】This purple color gel back seat cushion with high quality and elastic gel is composed of thousands of air columns, which are very well breathable and soft. Seat cushion will not break even if you put the egg and sit down.

【Pressure & Pain Relief】This office chair cushion for pressure sores is perfect to help with lower back, sciatic nerve, tailbone pain relief, coccyx, butt and hip pain. This gel pressure relief cushion with ergonomic design helps avoid numbness in the buttock's muscles and lumbar strain.

【Non-slip Cover & Zipper Design】The detachable non-slip seat cover with zipper design can be easily removed to be washed by machine. This way you can use the seat mattress without worrying about soiling the seat.

【Wide Applications】 This gel chair seat pads is great for office, school, computer desk, home, kitchen, stadium, patio, couch, recliner, car, taxi, truck, airplane train travel, camping fishing outdoor activities. It's suitable gifts for family, friends, colleagues and wheelchair seat cushions for seniors.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Soreness and numbness caused by sedentary is because your chair is too stiff. Made of premium gel and special honeycomb structure, gel pad is breathable and soft. Abroca gel seat cushion for long sitting is specially designed for pressure and pain relief. Seat cushion offers quick pain relief when your sciatica is raging, tailbone is aching and butt is sweating.
Different from memory foam cushions, gel cushions for sitting are made up of thousands of air columns, perfect structure to keep seat cushions breathable.

The zippered breathable non-slip cover is machine washable. Just remove the cover and toss in the washing machine. Please Put the anti-slip side towards the bottom so that the cover can rub against the chair to fix the position and not slide easily.

Gel pad helps to lower coccyx pain, sciatica, back, hip, tailbone pain, hemorrhoid, pressure sores, buttock pain and bed sores,supporting your office chair cushions for back and butt to sit for long periods.

Gel seat cushion for pressure relief is suitable for all kinds of chairs or seats. Chair pad provides comfortable support whether is at home or kitchen, in the office or the gym, on an airplane or a train. You can take anywhere and get comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Crafted from a combination of gel and silicone materials, this cushion offers an exceptional level of elasticity and comfort that has greatly improved my sitting experience. One of the standout features of this cushion is its unique construction. The gel and silicone materials used in its design provide a remarkable level of support and cushioning, making my chair instantly more comfortable. The cushion adds approximately 2 inches of extra thickness to my seat, which has made a significant difference in alleviating discomfort, especially during long periods of sitting.I have found that this cushion is particularly effective in addressing issues such as butt-soreness and back pain. The added height and supportive materials work together to distribute my weight more evenly, reducing pressure on certain areas and promoting better posture. This has been a lifesaver, especially during those days when I'm required to spend extended periods at my desk. In conclusion, the gel and silicone seat cushion has proven to be an indispensable addition to my workspace.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Product purchased as an addition to the standard "donut" cushion frequently used by people with sore butts. This product turned out to be much better: it's softer, lighter, nice looking, and doesn't project the very obvious purpose of having and carrying around a donut cushion. Well worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for mom
reviews.reviewText: My mother is wheelchair bound so this is perfect so she does t get pressure sores.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not the best for sitting. But for my purpose, is perfect.
reviews.reviewText: I got this cushion to use on a foot rest, because my heels would often hurt otherwise, and for that, it works perfectly. But this thing is thin and not the best if you want to use it on a chair. Better than JUST a seat cushion, but there are better out there. I've got a Purple seat cushion, and it's amazing. The thickness alone night and day. But, you get what you pay for. This is a decent cushion for cheap, and for me, is just what I needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It didn't do the best job for what I needed at first. I had to partially heal before getting any benefits. Now i can use it happily and with relief. It really does a good job of spreading out the pressure of sitting a long time. I have to sleep sitting up too. The therapeutic cushion I had to get to allow me to heal is too bulky to allow me comfort in sleeping. This one does the trick just fine. I will also be using it to NOT have this problem when i am completely healed, so i don't get it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The size is too small to be comfortable. This barely covered the chair I sat on. I gave up trying to sit on it and ordered a larger pad. I did finally use this small pad for a back lumbar support and only then it barely fit. This is NOT a supportive sitting pad.
